items.markText: Whatever you can do or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it.
Don‚Äôt judge any man until you have walked two moons in his moccasins.
Strength is not the ability to not cry; it‚Äôs the ability to cry, to laugh, to be scared, to be brave, to communicate respectful anger and frustration ‚Äî to feel and express those feelings.
When the heart is breaking with sorrow for what it has lost, the soul is singing with joy for what it has gained.
The enemy of the ‚Äòbest‚Äô is often the ‚Äògood.‚Äô‚Äù
Grief is a necessary part of healing.
Courage only comes after you have faced the fear.
The Pit is that place we go to when we think we don‚Äôt have any power. It‚Äôs where we blame everyone and everything for where we‚Äôre at.
People come into your life for a reason, a season, or a lifetime
May the magic of her soul be sprinkled‚Ä®throughout all of our lives.Ôªø
No one can go back and make a brand-new start, my friend, but anyone can start from here and make a brand-new end.

We cannot change the past, and we cannot change anything that has happened to us. However, we do have the power to change our perceptions of these events and our responses to them, and that can affect our present and our future.
Just find out what the other person wants to feel loved and give it to them!
How we hold ourselves physically affects how we feel emotionally (as well as vice versa).
‚ÄúIf nothing changes, nothing changes,‚Äù and feedback can be one of the greatest teachers of all.

users.name: youudon
users.vDesc: In me the tiger sniffs the roses.

items.markText: Fake it till you make it.

When we have true empathy, we don‚Äôt cloud the situation with our feelings, thoughts, and opinions. We use our imaginative skills to picture what it must be like for the other person to experience this situation.
Resentment is like taking poison and waiting for the other person to die.
When we understand that we are all different, we begin to appreciate that our reactions and emotions are also different.

users.name: youudon
users.vDesc: In me the tiger sniffs the roses.

items.markText: Our past does not hurt us. The pain comes from the meaning we ascribe to the experience, and this creates the hurt we feel in the present as well.

users.name: youudon
users.vDesc: In me the tiger sniffs the roses.

items.markText: The most powerful way to influence another person is through our actions. People follow what we do, not what we say, and being is the outcome of doing ‚Äî so the best way to teach is to be.
Empathy is always about remaining completely neutral.
When we really step into the shoes of the customer and wear their eyes, ears, and emotions for a moment, we create a connection that‚Äôs trusting and real.
Whatever we want for ourselves is usually a good indicator of what we should give first to another; what we give, we usually receive.
How empty of me to be so full of you

Living in the NOW is allowing ourselves to feel all of our emotions ‚Äî the Ôªøgood feelings and the not-so-good feelings ‚Äî so we can experience them and then release them, thus allowing ourselves to move forward.
Being positive simply means taking life as it comes and being present in all of the situations life offers.
the only time success comes before work is in the dictionary!

The only way for us to live a different life is to learn from what we have experienced and, more important, to take action ‚Äî to change our behaviors in order to get a different result in the future.
Doing is the bridge to being ‚Äî going from conscious to unconscious.
Nothing is going to change the event, but how we perceive it could change everything internally.
Success is not about avoiding the challenging experiences of life; it‚Äôs about embracing them, really feeling them, and becoming a better person as a result.
Change is not achieved without inconvenience, even from worse to better.
When we have the courage to not share our negative thoughts, we weaken them. That‚Äôs why gossip is so highly charged; the more we gossip, the more it‚Äôs fuelled.
Our hearts are meant to be broken, but they never break in two ‚Äî they just break open to allow us to love more and feel even more.
I am not responsible for how others behave, but I am responsible for how I interpret that behavior and how I react to it.‚Äù
To intellectualize something is to stand separate from it and observe it.
It is one thing to find the wisdom from our pain; it is another thing altogether to use that wisdom to create a new way of living.

We think we need to have the feeling first, in order to do the behavior, but we don‚Äôt. It‚Äôs usually the opposite. If we just make the decision, do the behavior, and fake the feeling for a while, more often than not we will actually start feeling it for real!‚Äù
If we are to fake it till we make it, we need to fake the positive behaviors, thoughts, and feelings that are opposite to the negative ones we‚Äôre currently experiencing.

The faster we learn how to experience the pain, push through it, and learn what action we have to take, the sooner we will come out the other side with much more wisdom, resilience, and gratitude for what we have achieved and received.

More often than not, our feelings will eventually catch up with our behaviors. So instead of waiting for the feeling to arrive, why not behave that way first and pretend to feel it too? You‚Äôll soon find that you actually do start feeling that way. Instead of being stuck, you start moving.
Sweetheart, I would much prefer one of your fake smiles to one of your sincere frowns!‚Äù
A necessary part of having a successful transition from what you are to what you want to be is allowing yourself to become the explorer in your own life.
Terry, I am scared that if I don‚Äôt stay sad about my pony dying, people will think I don‚Äôt love him anymore, so that‚Äôs why I need to stay sad.‚Äù
How do I want to appear in this person‚Äôs Book of Life?‚Äù
If I have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants. ‚Äî Isaac Newton.
Remember, there is no failure, only feedback, and feedback is a necessary part of the success journey ‚Äî the journey of uncovering the wonderful mystery called you!

When we visualize the place in our past that offers us the learning from that painful experience, we can see that regardless of the pain, this experience has provided us with an increased depth of wisdom and understanding.
The things we dislike in others are usually the things that we dislike in ourselves but are not willing to admit to.
